text: Ɛ n ma goron tongo gbelemɛn11.29 Goron tongo gbelemɛni ito bunna nɛɛn fa fala muxune lan e xa Yesu a dunuɲa yi gidi kiin tongo. Na mi muxune findima konyine ra, koni a e raxɔrɔyama e yulubina konyiyaan nan ma. tongo, ɛ yi n ma xaranna suxu bayo n limaniyaxi, n nan n yɛtɛ magodoxi, ɛ niine matabun sɔtɔma nɛn.
